verses.verse: וּכְכַלּ֣וֹת <WH3615> u-che-chal-Lot Now when all this was finished כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all זֹ֗את <WH2063> Zot, likewise יָצְא֨וּ <WH3318> ya-tze-'U went out כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all יִשְׂרָאֵ֥ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El all Israel הַֽנִּמְצְאִים֮ <WH4672> han-nim-tze-'Im that were present לְעָרֵ֣י <WH5892> le-'a-Rei to the cities יְהוּדָה֒ <WH3063> ye-hu-Dah of Judah וַיְשַׁבְּר֣וּ <WH7665> vay-shab-be-Ru in pieces הַמַּצֵּב֣וֹת <WH4676> ham-matz-tze-Vot the images וַיְגַדְּע֣וּ <WH1438> vay-gad-de-'U and cut down הָאֲשֵׁרִ֡ים <WH842> ha-'a-she-Rim the groves וַיְנַתְּצ֣וּ <WH5422> vay-nat-te-Tzu and threw down אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַ֠בָּמוֹת <WH1116> Hab-ba-mot the high places וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et הַֽמִּזְבְּחֹ֞ת <WH4196> ham-miz-be-Chot and the altars מִכָּל־ <WH3605> mik-kol all יְהוּדָ֧ה <WH3063> ye-hu-Dah out of all Judah וּבִנְיָמִ֛ן <WH1144> u-vin-ya-Min and Benjamin וּבְאֶפְרַ֥יִם <WH669> u-ve-'ef-Ra-yim in Ephraim וּמְנַשֶּׁ֖ה <WH4519> u-me-nash-Sheh also and Manasseh עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- until לְכַלֵּ֑ה <WH3615> le-chal-Leh; until they had utterly destroyed וַיָּשׁ֜וּבוּ <WH7725> vai-ya-Shu-vu returned כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all בְּנֵ֧י <WH1121> be-Nei them all Then all the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El of Israel אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> 'ish every man לַאֲחֻזָּת֖וֹ <WH272> la-'a-chuz-za-To to his possession לְעָרֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH5892> le-'a-rei-Hem. into their own cities ס sa-Mek

וַיַּעֲמֵ֣ד <WH5975> vai-ya-'a-Med appointed יְחִזְקִיָּ֡הוּ <WH2396> ye-chiz-ki-Ya-hu and Hezekiah אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- מַחְלְק֣וֹת <WH4256> mach-le-Kot the courses הַכֹּהֲנִ֣ים <WH3548> hak-ko-ha-Nim of the priests וְ֠הַלְוִיִּם <WH3881> Ve-hal-vi-yim and the Levites עַֽל־ <WH5921> 'al- by מַחְלְקוֹתָ֞ם <WH4256> mach-le-ko-Tam after their courses אִ֣ישׁ׀ <WH376> 'ish every man כְּפִ֣י <WH6310> ke-Fi according עֲבֹדָת֗וֹ <WH5656> a-vo-da-To, to his service לַכֹּהֲנִים֙ <WH3548> lak-ko-ha-Nim the priests וְלַלְוִיִּ֔ם <WH3881> ve-lal-vi-Yim, and Levites לְעֹלָ֖ה <WH5930> le-'o-Lah for burnt offerings וְלִשְׁלָמִ֑ים <WH8002> ve-lish-la-Mim; and for peace offerings לְשָׁרֵת֙ <WH8334> le-sha-Ret to minister וּלְהֹד֣וֹת <WH3034> u-le-ho-Dot and to give thanks וּלְהַלֵּ֔ל <WH1984> u-le-hal-Lel, and to praise בְּשַׁעֲרֵ֖י <WH8179> be-sha-'a-Rei in the gates מַחֲנ֥וֹת <WH4264> ma-cha-Not of the tents יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3069> Yah-weh. God ס sa-Mek

וּמְנָת֩ <WH4521> u-me-Nat portion הַמֶּ֨לֶךְ <WH4428> ham-Me-lech [He appointed] also the king's מִן־ <WH4480> min- at רְכוּשׁ֜וֹ <WH7399> re-chu-Sho of his substance לָעֹל֗וֹת <WH5930> la-'o-Lot, for the burnt offerings לְעֹלוֹת֙ <WH5930> le-'o-lOt burnt offerings הַבֹּ֣קֶר <WH1242> hab-Bo-ker [to wit] for the morning וְהָעֶ֔רֶב <WH6153> ve-ha-'E-rev, and evening וְהָ֣עֹל֔וֹת <WH5930> ve-Ha-'o-Lot, and the burnt offerings לַשַּׁבָּת֖וֹת <WH7676> lash-shab-ba-Tot for the sabbaths וְלֶחֳדָשִׁ֣ים <WH2320> ve-le-cho-da-Shim and for the new moons וְלַמֹּעֲדִ֑ים <WH4150> ve-lam-mo-'a-Dim; and for the set feasts כַּכָּת֖וּב <WH3789> kak-ka-Tuv as [it is] written בְּתוֹרַ֥ת <WH8451> be-to-Rat in the law יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. of the LORD

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer Moreover he commanded לָעָם֙ <WH5971> la-'Am the people לְיוֹשְׁבֵ֣י <WH3427> le-yo-she-Vei that dwelt יְרוּשָׁלִַ֔ם <WH3389> ye-ru-sha-Lim, in Jerusalem לָתֵ֕ת <WH5414> la-Tet to give מְנָ֥ת <WH4521> me-Nat the portion הַכֹּהֲנִ֖ים <WH3548> hak-ko-ha-Nim of the priests וְהַלְוִיִּ֑ם <WH3881> ve-hal-vi-Yim; and the Levites לְמַ֥עַן <WH4616> le-Ma-'an might יֶחֶזְק֖וּ <WH2388> ye-chez-Ku that they might be encouraged בְּתוֹרַ֥ת <WH8451> be-to-Rat in the law יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. of the LORD

וְכִפְרֹ֣ץ <WH6555> ve-chif-Rotz came abroad הַדָּבָ֗ר <WH1697> had-da-Var, And as soon as the commandment הִרְבּ֤וּ <WH7235> hir-Bu in abundance בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> ve-nei- the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El of Israel רֵאשִׁ֣ית <WH7225> re-Shit the firstfruits דָּגָ֗ן <WH1715> da-Gan, of corn תִּיר֤וֹשׁ <WH8492> ti-Roosh wine וְיִצְהָר֙ <WH3323> ve-yitz-Har and oil וּדְבַ֔שׁ <WH1706> u-de-Vash, and honey וְכֹ֖ל <WH3605> ve-Chol all תְּבוּאַ֣ת <WH8393> te-vu-'At and of all the increase שָׂדֶ֑ה <WH7704> sa-Deh; of the field וּמַעְשַׂ֥ר <WH4643> u-ma'-Sar and the tithe הַכֹּ֛ל <WH3605> hak-Kol of all לָרֹ֖ב <WH7230> la-Ro they in abundantly הֵבִֽיאוּ׃ <WH935> he-Vi-'u. brought

וּבְנֵ֧י <WH1121> u-ve-Nei And [concerning] the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֣ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El of Israel וִֽיהוּדָ֗ה <WH3063> vi-hu-Dah, and Judah הַיּֽוֹשְׁבִים֮ <WH3427> hai-yo-she-Vim that dwelt בְּעָרֵ֣י <WH5892> be-'a-Rei in the cities יְהוּדָה֒ <WH3063> ye-hu-Dah of Judah גַּם־ <WH1571> gam- also הֵ֗ם <WH1992> Hem, in מַעְשַׂ֤ר <WH4643> ma'-Sar the tithe בָּקָר֙ <WH1241> ba-Kar of oxen וָצֹ֔אן <WH6629> va-Tzon, and sheep וּמַעְשַׂ֣ר <WH4643> u-ma'-Sar and the tithe קָֽדָשִׁ֔ים <WH6944> ka-da-Shim, of holy things הַמְקֻדָּשִׁ֖ים <WH6942> ham-kud-da-Shim which were consecrated לַיהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh unto the LORD אֱלֹהֵיהֶ֑ם <WH430> 'e-lo-hei-Hem; their God הֵבִ֕יאוּ <WH935> he-Vi-'u they also brought in וַֽיִּתְּנ֖וּ <WH5414> vai-yit-te-Nu and laid עֲרֵמ֥וֹת <WH6194> a-re-Mot heaps עֲרֵמֽוֹת׃ <WH6194> a-re-Mot. heaps ס sa-Mek

בַּחֹ֙דֶשׁ֙ <WH2320> ba-Cho-desh month הַשְּׁלִשִׁ֔י <WH7992> hash-she-li-Shi, In the third הֵחֵ֥לּוּ <WH2490> he-Chel-lu they began הָעֲרֵמ֖וֹת <WH6194> ha-'a-re-Mot of the heaps לְיִסּ֑וֹד <WH3245> le-yis-Sod; to lay the foundation וּבַחֹ֥דֶשׁ <WH2320> u-va-Cho-desh month הַשְּׁבִיעִ֖י <WH7637> hash-she-vi-'I [them] in the seventh כִּלּֽוּ׃ <WH3615> kil-Lu. and finished ס sa-Mek

וַיָּבֹ֙אוּ֙ <WH935> vai-ya-Vo-'u came יְחִזְקִיָּ֣הוּ <WH2396> ye-chiz-ki-Ya-hu Hezekiah וְהַשָּׂרִ֔ים <WH8269> ve-has-sa-Rim, and the princes וַיִּרְא֖וּ <WH7200> vai-yir-'U and saw אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הָעֲרֵמ֑וֹת <WH6194> ha-'a-re-Mot; the heaps וַֽיְבָרֲכוּ֙ <WH1288> vay-va-ra-Chu they blessed אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah-weh, the LORD וְאֵ֖ת <WH853> ve-'Et עַמּ֥וֹ <WH5971> am-Mo and his people יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El. Israel פ Peh

וַיִּדְרֹ֣שׁ <WH1875> vai-yid-Rosh questioned יְחִזְקִיָּ֗הוּ <WH2396> ye-chiz-ki-Ya-hu, Hezekiah עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- concerning הַכֹּֽהֲנִ֛ים <WH3548> hak-ko-ha-Nim with the priests וְהַלְוִיִּ֖ם <WH3881> ve-hal-vi-Yim and the Levites עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- concerning הָעֲרֵמֽוֹת׃ <WH6194> ha-'a-re-Mot. concerning the heaps

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer answered אֵלָ֗יו <WH413> 'e-Lav, about עֲזַרְיָ֧הוּ <WH5838> 'a-zar-Ya-hu And Azariah הַכֹּהֵ֛ן <WH3548> hak-ko-Hen priest הָרֹ֖אשׁ <WH7218> ha-Rosh the chief לְבֵ֣ית <WH1004> le-Veit of the house צָד֑וֹק <WH6659> tza-Dok; of Zadok וַ֠יֹּאמֶר <WH559> Vai-yo-mer him and said מֵהָחֵ֨ל <WH2490> me-ha-Chel Since [the people] began הַתְּרוּמָ֜ה <WH8641> hat-te-ru-Mah the offerings לָבִ֣יא <WH935> la-Vi to bring בֵית־ <WH1004> veit- into the house יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD אָכ֨וֹל <WH398> a-Chol to eat וְשָׂב֤וֹעַ <WH7646> ve-sa-Vo-a' we have had enough וְהוֹתֵר֙ <WH3498> ve-ho-Ter and have left עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- with לָר֔וֹב <WH7230> la-Rov, plenty כִּ֤י <WH3588> ki for יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> Yah-weh for the LORD בֵּרַ֣ךְ <WH1288> be-Rach hath blessed אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- עַמּ֔וֹ <WH5971> am-Mo, his people וְהַנּוֹתָ֖ר <WH3498> ve-han-no-Tar and that which is left אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הֶהָמ֥וֹן <WH1995> he-ha-Mon [is] this great store הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> haz-Zeh. and this ס sa-Mek

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer commanded יְחִזְקִיָּ֗הוּ <WH2396> ye-chiz-ki-Ya-hu, Hezekiah לְהָכִ֧ין <WH3559> le-ha-Chin to prepare לְשָׁכ֛וֹת <WH3957> le-sha-Chot chambers בְּבֵ֥ית <WH1004> be-Veit in the house יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD וַיָּכִֽינוּ׃ <WH3559> vai-ya-Chi-nu. and they prepared

וַיָּבִ֨יאוּ <WH935> vai-ya-Vi-'u And brought in אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַתְּרוּמָ֧ה <WH8641> hat-te-ru-Mah the offerings וְהַֽמַּעֲשֵׂ֛ר <WH4643> ve-ham-ma-'a-Ser and the tithes וְהַקֳּדָשִׁ֖ים <WH6944> ve-hak-ko-da-Shim and the dedicated בֶּאֱמוּנָ֑ה <WH530> be-'e-mu-Nah; [things] faithfully וַעֲלֵיהֶ֤ם <WH5921> va-'a-lei-Hem charge נָגִיד֙ <WH5057> na-Gid [was] ruler; כֹּונַנְיָהוּ ko-nan-ya-hu ככָּֽנַנְיָ֣הוּ <WH3562> ka-nan-Ya-hu Conaniah קהַלֵּוִ֔י <WH3881> hal-le-Vi, the Levite וְשִׁמְעִ֥י <WH8096> ve-shim-'I and Shimei אָחִ֖יהוּ <WH251> 'a-Chi-hu his brother מִשְׁנֶֽה׃ <WH4932> mish-Neh. [was] the next

וִֽיחִיאֵ֡ל <WH3171> vi-chi-'El And Jehiel וַ֠עֲזַזְיָהוּ <WH5812> Va-'a-zaz-ya-hu and Azaziah וְנַ֨חַת <WH5184> ve-Na-chat and Nahath וַעֲשָׂהאֵ֜ל <WH6214> va-'a-sa-h-'El and Asahel וִֽירִימ֤וֹת <WH3406> vi-ri-Mot and Jerimoth וְיוֹזָבָד֙ <WH3107> ve-yo-za-Vad and Jozabad וֶאֱלִיאֵ֣ל <WH447> ve-'e-li-'El and Eliel וְיִסְמַכְיָ֔הוּ <WH3253> ve-yis-mach-Ya-hu, and Ismachiah וּמַ֖חַת <WH4287> u-Ma-chat and Mahath וּבְנָיָ֑הוּ <WH1141> u-ve-na-Ya-hu; and Benaiah פְּקִידִ֗ים <WH6496> pe-ki-Dim, [were] overseers מִיַּ֤ד <WH3027> mi-Yad under the hand; כָּונַנְיָהוּ ka-v-nan-ya-hu ככָּֽנַנְיָ֙הוּ֙ <WH3562> ka-nan-Ya-hu Conaniah קוְשִׁמְעִ֣י <WH8096> ve-shim-'I and Shimei אָחִ֔יו <WH251> 'a-Chiv, his brother בְּמִפְקַד֙ <WH4662> be-mif-Kad at the commandment יְחִזְקִיָּ֣הוּ <WH2396> ye-chiz-ki-Ya-hu Hezekiah הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> ham-Me-lech, the king וַעֲזַרְיָ֖הוּ <WH5838> va-'a-zar-Ya-hu and Azariah נְגִ֥יד <WH5057> ne-Gid the ruler בֵּית־ <WH1004> beit- of the house הָאֱלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> ha-'E-lo-Him. of God

וְקוֹרֵ֨א <WH6981> ve-ko-Re And Kore בֶן־ <WH1121> ven- the son יִמְנָ֤ה <WH3232> yim-Nah of Imnah הַלֵּוִי֙ <WH3881> hal-le-Vi the Levite הַשּׁוֹעֵ֣ר <WH7778> hash-sho-'Er the porter לַמִּזְרָ֔חָה <WH4217> lam-miz-Ra-chah, toward the east עַ֖ל <WH5921> 'al over נִדְב֣וֹת <WH5071> nid-Vot [was] over the freewill offerings הָאֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> ha-'E-lo-Him; of God לָתֵת֙ <WH5414> la-Tet to distribute תְּרוּמַ֣ת <WH8641> te-ru-Mat the oblations יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah-weh, of the LORD וְקָדְשֵׁ֖י <WH6942> ve-ka-de-Shei appoint הַקֳּדָשִֽׁים׃ <WH6944> hak-ko-da-Shim. and the most

וְעַל־ <WH5921> ve-'al- Under יָד֡וֹ <WH3027> ya-Do by עֵ֣דֶן <WH5731> 'E-den And next him [were] Eden וּ֠מִנְיָמִן <WH4509> U-min-ya-min and Miniamin וְיֵשׁ֨וּעַ <WH3442> ve-ye-Shu-a' and Jeshua וּֽשְׁמַֽעְיָ֜הוּ <WH8098> u-she-ma'-Ya-hu and Shemaiah אֲמַרְיָ֧הוּ <WH568> 'a-mar-Ya-hu Amariah וּשְׁכַנְיָ֛הוּ <WH7935> u-she-chan-Ya-hu and Shecaniah בְּעָרֵ֥י <WH5892> be-'a-Rei in the cities הַכֹּהֲנִ֖ים <WH3548> hak-ko-ha-Nim of the priests בֶּאֱמוּנָ֑ה <WH530> be-'e-mu-Nah; in [their] set office לָתֵ֤ת <WH5414> la-Tet to give לַאֲחֵיהֶם֙ <WH251> la-'a-chei-Hem to their brethren בְּמַחְלְק֔וֹת <WH4256> be-mach-le-Kot, courses כַּגָּד֖וֹל <WH1419> kag-ga-Dol as well to the great כַּקָּטָֽן׃ <WH6996> kak-ka-Tan. as to the small

מִלְּבַ֞ד <WH905> mil-le-Vad to הִתְיַחְשָׂ֣ם <WH3187> hit-yach-Sam Beside their genealogy לִזְכָרִ֗ים <WH2145> liz-cha-Rim, of males מִבֶּ֨ן <WH1121> mib-Ben old שָׁל֤וֹשׁ <WH7969> sha-Loosh from three שָׁנִים֙ <WH8141> sha-Nim years וּלְמַ֔עְלָה <WH4605> u-le-Ma'-lah, and upward לְכָל־ <WH3605> le-chol who הַבָּ֥א <WH935> hab-Ba [even] unto every one that entereth לְבֵית־ <WH1004> le-veit- into the house יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD לִדְבַר־ <WH1697> lid-var- portion י֣וֹם <WH3117> Yom his daily בְּיוֹמ֑וֹ <WH3117> be-yo-Mo; his daily לַעֲב֣וֹדָתָ֔ם <WH5656> la-'a-Vo-da-Tam, for their service בְּמִשְׁמְרוֹתָ֖ם <WH4931> be-mish-me-ro-Tam in their charges כְּמַחְלְקוֹתֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH4256> ke-mach-le-ko-tei-Hem. according to their courses

וְאֵ֨ת <WH853> ve-'Et הִתְיַחֵ֤שׂ <WH3188> hit-ya-Ches genealogy הַכֹּהֲנִים֙ <WH3548> hak-ko-ha-Nim of the priests לְבֵ֣ית <WH1004> le-Veit by the house אֲבוֹתֵיהֶ֔ם <WH1> a-vo-tei-Hem, of their fathers וְהַ֨לְוִיִּ֔ם <WH3881> ve-Hal-vi-Yim, and the Levites מִבֶּ֛ן <WH1121> mib-Ben old עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <WH6242> 'es-Rim from twenty שָׁנָ֖ה <WH8141> sha-Nah years וּלְמָ֑עְלָה <WH4605> u-le-Ma-'e-lah; and upward בְּמִשְׁמְרוֹתֵיהֶ֖ם <WH4931> be-mish-me-ro-tei-Hem in their charges בְּמַחְלְקוֹתֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH4256> be-mach-le-ko-tei-Hem. by their courses
